member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify
member.summary: Inserts vertices along line or polygon features. Also replaces curve segments (bezier, circular arcs, elliptical arcs) with densified line segments.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The polygon or line feature class to be densified. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.in_features
member.summary: The polygon or line feature class to be densified. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.densification_method
member.summary: Densification Method (in, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.distance
member.summary: The maximum linear distance between vertices. This distance will always be applied to line segments and to simplify curves. The default value is a function of the tolerance. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.max_deviation
member.summary: The maximum distance the output geometry can be from the input geometry. This parameter deals specifically with the simplification of curves. The default value is the value used to convert Feature Classes to Shapefiles. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.max_angle
member.summary: The maximum angle that the output geometry can be from the input geometry. This parameter specifically deals with the simplification of curves. The input angle can be between 0 and 90 degrees. The default value is the value used to convert Feature Classes to Shapefiles. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint
member.summary: Deletes points from the input that are either inside or outside the Remove Features, depending on the Operation Type.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input features inside or outside the Remove Features will be deleted, depending on the Operation Type parameter. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.in_features
member.summary: The input point features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.remove_features
member.summary: Input features inside or outside the Remove Features will be deleted, depending on the Operation Type parameter. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.operation_type
member.summary: Determines if points INSIDE or OUTSIDE the Remove Features will be deleted. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine
member.summary: This tool extends line segments to the first intersecting feature within a specified distance. If no intersecting feature is within the specified distance, the line segment will not be extended. Tool use is intended for quality control tasks such as cleaning up topology errors in features that were digitized without having set proper snapping environments.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The line input features to be extended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.in_features
member.summary: The line input features to be extended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.length
member.summary: The maximum distance a line segment can be extended to an intersecting feature. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.extend_to
member.summary: Controls whether line segments can be extended to other extended line segments within the specified extend length. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.FlipLine
member.summary: Reverses the from-to direction of line features.

member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input feature class or layer. This must be Polyline. (In, Required)

member.summary: The input feature class or layer. This must be Polyline. (In, Required)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap
member.summary: Moves points or vertices to coincide exactly with the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. Snapping rules can be specified to control whether the input vertices are snapped to the nearest vertex, edge, or endpoint within a specified distance.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input features whose vertices will be snapped to the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. The input features can be points, multipoints, lines, or polygons. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.in_features
member.summary: The input features whose vertices will be snapped to the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. The input features can be points, multipoints, lines, or polygons. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.snap_environment
member.summary: Snapping Environment Components: (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine
member.summary: Removes portions of a line that extend a specified distance past a line intersection (dangles). Any line that does not touch another line at both endpoints can be trimmed, but only the portion of the line that extends past the intersection by the specified distance will be removed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The line input features to be trimmed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.in_features
member.summary: The line input features to be trimmed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.dangle_length
member.summary: Line segments that are shorter than the specified Dangle Length and do not touch another line at both endpoints (dangles) will be trimmed. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.delete_shorts
member.summary: Controls whether line segments which are less than the dangle length and are free-standing will be deleted. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize
member.summary: Simplifies the input features using the Douglas-Peucker simplification algorithm with a specified maximum offset tolerance. The output features will contain a subset of the original input vertices.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The polygon or line features to be generalized. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.in_features
member.summary: The polygon or line features to be generalized. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.tolerance
member.summary: The tolerance sets the maximum allowable offset, which will determine the degree of simplification. This value limits the distance the output geometry can differ from the input geometry. You can specify a preferred unit of measurement. The default is the feature unit. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.
